title: ENG-440130: User to group mapping upon renaming groups for RT policy hit
custom_summary: This is to very RT policy hit for group based policy, when group name is changed
custom_steps:
Create a policy rule (Rule1) based on a group (Group A) and deploy.

Rename the group (“Group A”->”Group A2”).

Create another rule (Rule2) based on the renamed group (“Group A2”).  ui_policies.json will contain two rules with different group names but the same scim ID and the attributes table in dp_user_info.db will contain one entry with the current group name.

Verify that both rules can be matched.

Add a rule based on a different group with a different user and verify that it can be matched as well.
custom_expected: Verify that both rules can be matched for a user part of group renamed.
